page.title: 17BUCKMORE PARK
page.content: The director told us most counties have a Scout centre with a hut and some grass but"Kent went one better" with a{conference block}with cooking and sleeping places for Winter. They also built their own{swimming pool}in 1952,it was the first one open to the public in the Medway Towns.It is now used for{canoe lessons.}They also have an international{B.M.X.}track,{Go_Kart track,{archery,absailling, tennis,}an {assault course} <built by the army>, {roller skating}rink,{5_a_sidefootball and will have a small zoo.The centre is open to the public and some times 200 children go daily for a week. There is a{bunk house}with 6 bunks for scouts who come late at night. A few years ago a scout got lost in the{woods}for 2 days,it couldn't happen to_day because he would just listen for the sound of the{motorway.
